TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509IssuerSerial extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示 XML 数字签名的 <> 元素。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示 xml 数字签名 `` 规范定义的 xml 数字签名的元素。The structure represents the `` element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ``元素是元素的子 `` 元素，该元素包含 x.509v3 证书颁发者的可分辨名称和序列号对。The `` element is the subelement of the `` element that contains an X.509v3 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair. 可分辨名称和序列号对可帮助识别特定的 x.509v3 证书。The distinguished name and serial number pair help identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 证书的颁发者是颁发证书的证书颁发机构的名称。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 证书颁发机构会分配每个证书，并颁发唯一的序列号用于标识目的。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number for identification purposes. 使用 此结构可以在使用类时指定证书颁发者的可分辨名称和序列号对 。Use the structure to specify a certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair when using the class. 您可以 使用属性将结构添加到 类 。You can add an structure to the class using the property. 或者，可以使用方法添加表示 x.509 证书颁发者的可分辨名称和序列号对的字符串值 。Alternatively, you can add string values that represent the X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair using the method. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用证书存储区中的 x.509 证书对 XML 文档进行签名和验证。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此示例使用对象将密钥信息保存到签名的文档 。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 X.509 证书颁发者的可分辨名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

value.span: 一个 X.509 证书颁发者的识别名。

span.span: An X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示元素中指定的 x.509 证书颁发者的可分辨名称 `` 。The property represents an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name specified in the `` element. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用证书存储区中的 x.509 证书对 XML 文档进行签名和验证。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此示例使用对象将密钥信息保存到签名的文档 。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object.
